textAfterTable: Uses of PeripheralEventListener in com.oracle.deviceaccess.adc Subinterfaces of PeripheralEventListener in com.oracle.deviceaccess.adc   Modifier and Type Interface and Description interface  AcquisitionListener The AcquisitionListener interface defines methods for getting notified of the availability of sampled input values. interface  MonitoringListener The MonitoringListener interface defines methods for getting notified of ADC channel under- and over-threshold input value conditions. Uses of PeripheralEventListener in com.oracle.deviceaccess.counter Subinterfaces of PeripheralEventListener in com.oracle.deviceaccess.counter   Modifier and Type Interface and Description interface  CountingListener The CountingListener interface defines methods for getting notified of pulse counter counting conditions such as counter terminal value reached or counting session time interval expired. Uses of PeripheralEventListener in com.oracle.deviceaccess.dac
